ing: 4 Hass avocados, halved, pitted, and peeled
5 dashes hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®), or to taste
des: "This recipe is as close to what you'll find in a good Mexican restaurant along the southwest U.S. border. It is so good, it is addictive."
ins:
Mash avocados in a bowl with a fork until smooth.
Mix onion and tomatoes into mashed avocado.
Stir lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, and salt into avocado mixture with a wooden spoon.
